content:
Have you tried right clicking on the folder, selecting properties and then the repair button.

That has been the standard first option for topics like this since before Thunderbird V3 was released some 14 years ago. We are here still repeating the same advise almost a decade and a half later, even though previous topics are presented as part of seeking to post a new topic.

content:
Select the email in the list. Press 1. It is now tagged as important. Or Enable the classic menu at the top and select the message menu and then the tag sub menu Or Select the message in the list, right click and select tag from the menu Or Click more in the message header and select the tag menu item

I think they are all the same as in V102. Is there some other way that is now missing?
creator: MattAuSupport
